samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The sample demonstrates the default functionalities of the Toolbar control which place commands with the scrollable mode in TypeScript platform.

samples.name: Popup
samples.description: The sample exposes popup mode of Toolbar control which configures overflowing toolbar commands inside a popup based on priority in TypeScript platform.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: The sample mode of Toolbar control which configures overflowing toolbar commands inside a popup based on priority in TypeScript platform.

samples.name: Alignment
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to align commands in left, right and center position in Toolbar control in TypeScript platform.

samples.name: Keyboard Interaction
samples.description: This demo showcases the keyboard shortcuts applicable on Toolbar
